name: Hobo Bob Remastered
description:
Breeze through three incomplete levels and face terrible monsters such as "Alien" and "Purple Guy" in this "recreation" of the first (and most awful) game I made.

The initial release will just be the bare minimum, however more content is to come as I expand the scope and truly make this a remastering.

So join Bob on his quest to defeat the dragon and get to the end of this absurd game!
